title: The White Stripes - Live In Las Vegas vinyl rip [FLAC]
description:
Well, what can I say?

This release has taken me countless hours of fiddling with restoration crap.
Enjoy damnit! :p

Thanks to herbman75 @ thepiratebay for ripping the vinyls.
original release: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/3649201/The_White_Stripes_-_Live_In_Las_Vegas_-_Rare_Vinyl_Promo_Rip_.wa

Regardless of how bad the rip was, it's still rare music, right?

This torrent is my attempt at restoring his torrent.

I know some of it still doesn't sound that fantastic, but for comparative purposes I've included a sample of the unrestored tracks, so you can see what I was working with. Hopefully you can enjoy it regardless of the quality :)

Sadly the restoration process did remove some of the artificial reverb someone had added to it. For some reason someone in V2 Records must have decided that a soundboard-sourced recording needed some ambience, because on parts when Jack is just singing, they added a massive reverb -.-, while only putting mild reverb on the rest.

Also, I included a perspective-corrected pic of the vinyl cover (original pic also posted by herbman75)

If you want to know more about this release, check out the following included files:

original info.txt is the info uploaded with the original (unrestored) torrent on thepiratebay.
tracks.txt is a list taken from whitestripes.com, detailing the gig. I added track numbers and showed the split between vinyl sides.
restoration.txt is an almost complete list of what I did to restore this (read if you dare, for some of it even I don't know what I was writing, but it must have been important at the time).

Enjoy!

[/blank release]
